us.ba3.me

Class BitmapSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.ba3.me.BitmapSimple

  • public final class BitmapSimple
extends java.lang.Object
    BitmapSimple is a helper class used to extract image data from Bitmaps into an array of bytes.
